title: Judges & Bench Management
description: Maintain judge profiles, bench assignments, and specialization tracking
overview: The Judges module maintains a comprehensive directory of judicial officers across all courts and tribunals. Track judge specializations, bench assignments, case history, and professional backgrounds to inform case strategy and scheduling decisions.

keyFeatures.title: Judge Directory
keyFeatures.description: Comprehensive database of judicial officers with contact and profile details

keyFeatures.title: Bench Assignments
keyFeatures.description: Track which judges sit on which benches and their tenure

keyFeatures.title: Specialization Tracking
keyFeatures.description: Record areas of expertise (Tax, Constitutional, Commercial, etc.)

keyFeatures.title: Case History
keyFeatures.description: Link judges to cases they've presided over for reference

keyFeatures.title: Availability Calendar
keyFeatures.description: Track judge leave schedules and sitting days

keyFeatures.title: Notes & Observations
keyFeatures.description: Record professional observations and case-handling tendencies
